name: Beli
description: The Beli is a small fey creature known for its sleek frame and agile movements, possessing natural armor that aids in its defense.
memorable: The Beli's Cold Regeneration ability makes it a formidable opponent in icy environments, capable of recovering health unless harmed by fire.
goals: The Beli typically seeks to outmaneuver its opponents and exploit its agility in battle, utilizing stealth and surprise.
relations: Often encountered alongside other cold-themed fey creatures, the Beli may serve or be allied with ice elementals or winter spirits.
environment: Typically found in snowy or cold environments, thriving in conditions below freezing.
strengths: Exceptionally agile in combat, with the ability to fly and move without provoking opportunity attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which negates its regenerative abilities.
attacks: Utilizes melee and ranged attacks with ice-infused weapons, delivering both piercing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Its Cold Regeneration capability allows it to regain health in cold environments, but it is rendered inactive by fire damage.
senses: The Beli has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception of 14, making it adept at detecting threats in darkness.
skills: It has proficiency in Dexterity saving throws and is particularly skilled in Stealth and Perception, allowing it to avoid detection and observe its surroundings effectively.
additional_information: Advantage on Stealth and Perception in snowy terrain due to Arctic Hunter ability.
Ice Dagger attacks deal both piercing and cold damage.
Icy Shortbow attacks can inflict exhaustion and even reduce opponents to 0 hit points under certain conditions.
Can turn invisible to escape or reposition stealthily.
